sourcesContent: import { Box, Heading, HStack, Image, Text } from '@chakra-ui/core' import { MdMovie } from 'react-icons/md' import axios from "axios" import { baseURL } from '../axiosConfig' import Link from 'next/link' export default function Movie ({data,title}) { console.log(data) return {title} { data.map(move=>( {move.tittle} )) } } export function loadMovie() { return axios.get('/api/movie',{ baseURL }) }
